title: Fragment, 1750–1800
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: block printed using resist on both sides of the fabric, vat dyed in indigo on plain weave
dimensions: Warp:56.7cm (22 1/4in. ). Weft: (selvage on one side) 54.5cm (21 1/4 in.).
description: Side 1: floral stripes, both straight and curving. Side 2: Curving stripes alternate with a balloon.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 1750–1800.
1750–1800. Medium: linen
Technique: block printed using resist on both sides of the fabric, vat dyed in indigo on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-313.
